title: Accidental shooting death in Rockdale under investigation
content:
Found dead of a gunshot wound at about 8 p.m. was Julian Tovar, 51, of Rockdale.
Witnesses in the 900 block of CR 319 south of Rockdale said Tovar accidentally shot himself, believing the firearm wasn’t loaded, White said.
Milam County Justice of the Peace Rick Gommert pronounced Tovar dead and ordered an autopsy by the Travis County Medical Examiner’s Office.
The autopsy results weren’t received by Tuesday at press time, White said.
